issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.92 (foreground color: #333333, background color: #7744aa, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.26 (foreground color: #333333, background color: #cc8800, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.92:1. Recommendation:  change background to #fefeff.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.92:1. Recommendation:  change background to #fefeff.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > main > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(2)

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.27:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #2f2f2f.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.27:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #2f2f2f.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > main > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(5)

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

issues.title: Images must have alternative text
issues.description: Ensure elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation

any.message: Element does not have an alt attribute
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

issues.title: Img element missing an alt attribute. Use the alt attribute to specify a short text alternative.

original_issue.message: Img element missing an alt attribute. Use the alt attribute to specify a short text alternative.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > aside > div:nth-child(1) > img

issues.title: Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes
issues.description: Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

issues.title: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

any.message: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

nodes.html: ABOUT DISCLAIM SITEMAP CONTACT PRIVACY KERALA PSC
nodes.failureSummary:

issues.title: All page content should be contained by landmarks
issues.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks

any.message: Some page content is not contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Main > Information on India > Knowledge > Years

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (40.3px by 18px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 19px instead of at least 24px.
